system.description:
The sound waves around you now become a lethal weapon. Using your mutated mind you now can transform them into pure energy and throw it at your foes like a bolt of lightning! When you gain this ability and at the end of a long rest roll [[/roll 1D6]], this is how many times you can hurl your sound bolt per day. The sound bolt deals [[/roll 1d6x6]]{1D6!} to any target within eyesight of you.

Max Range: 120ft.
